name: Sesame Street Elmo's Learn & Go School Bus Interactive Toy with Lights and Sounds, Toddlers Learn The Alphabet, Phonics, Numbers, Music, & More, Toy for Girls, Boys, Kids, Ages 2 and Up by Just Play
short_description: Includes: interactive toy vehicle.
Hop Aboard for Learning Fun: The Sesame Street Elmo's Learn & Go School Bus is packed with interactive ways to explore letters, numbers, and more—turning playtime into a learning adventure.
Press, Play, and Learn: With 37 colorful buttons, flashing lights, and engaging phrases, young learners can discover letters, numbers, and sounds, while developing fine motor skills and coordination.
Explore Letters and Numbers: Press a letter to hear its name, letter sounds, and a word that begins with that letter, like “B is for ball!” Number keys invite kids to count along. "Let's count to 5!"
Practice ABCs With Elmo: Tap Elmo's head to hear phrases and "The Alphabet Song." Singing along with Elmo makes learning extra fun!
Imaginative Vehicle Play: Elmo's school bus toy features free-rolling wheels, a door that opens, and a Sesame Street sign that slides and clicks for sensory fun.
Take Learning Anywhere: Measuring 9" x 12" with a built-in handle, this bus is ready to roll along on road trips, playdates, and on-the-go adventures.

Officially Licensed Sesame Street Toy by Just Play: This Sesame Street early learning and education toy makes a great birthday present, holiday gift, or anytime surprise for children ages 2 years and up.
2 x AA batteries required (included).
Ages 2 years and up.
product_description: Hop on the bus for a fun-filled learning adventure with the Sesame Street Elmo’s Learn & Go School Bus! This Sesame Street toy vehicle is packed with interactive features that help little learners build key developmental and learning skills through play. With 37 colorful buttons, flashing lights, and engaging phrases, this learning and education toy encourages toddlers to press, play, and explore the alphabet, numbers, music, and more while developing fine motor skills. Slide the switch to On and let the fun begin! Press a letter to hear its name, letter sounds, and a word beginning with that letter. Tap a number to count aloud with Elmo. Press Elmo's head to sing along to "The Alphabet Song" and hear Elmo phrases. This toy bus has free-rolling wheels for push-along vehicle play, a door that opens, and a Sesame Street sign that clicks when kids slide it back and forth for fidget fun. Lights, sounds, and music make learning an exciting, sensory experience, while the built-in handle and compact size make it easy to take anywhere. This Sesame Street Elmo kids' toy makes a great surprise for children ages 2 years and up. Requires 2 x AA batteries (included). Sesame Street and associated characters, trademarks, and design elements are owned and licensed by Sesame Workshop.

name: Take Apart School Bus Toy, Large DIY Assembly Vehicle with Screwdriver Handle + 3 Bits, Lights & Sounds, Inertia Powered, Openable Doors, Includes 2 Student Figures – Gift for Kids Ages 3+
short_description: 🔧 [DIY Take-Apart Fun with Real Tools] Kids can disassemble and reassemble their own school bus with the included screwdriver handle and 3 interchangeable bits. Perfect for developing hands-on skills, coordination, and early engineering interest.

🚨 [Lights, Sounds & Realistic Effects] Push one of the 4 buttons on top to activate school bus sounds, cheerful music, and flashing red & blue lights inside the cabin. Adds immersive fun to every playtime.
🚗 [Inertia-Powered for Easy Motion] Simply push the bus forward and watch it go! The friction-powered design makes movement smooth and engaging—no batteries required for driving.

🧒👧 [Includes 2 Student Figures] Features a boy & girl figure for classroom adventures and pretend play. Place them in the bus to create daily school stories while encouraging imagination, language, and social-emotional skills.

🎁 [Big, Sturdy & Perfect for Gifting] With its impressive size of 14.6 x 3.5 x 4.5 inches, this school bus makes a strong visual impact during play. Made of thick, durable ABS material that's safe for little hands—ideal for birthdays, holidays, and everyday fun for kids ages 3+.

This bright yellow school bus features 26 colorful letter buttons that come alive with unique and silly personalities. Press a letter button in letter mode to hear its name and sound. product_description: Hop on, sing along, and take a musical ride to school in Bonnie’s School Bus from B. toys! Drive up to a pretend bus stop, flip-open the stop sign, open the door, and let the two students hop on the bus. As you roll to class, press on Bonnie’s head for lights & sounds and sing along to The Wheels on the Bus Go Round and Round. Drive to school and watch the students dance as you go! The fun features of this musical bus spark sensory development and promote creative play. And because we at B. keep the environment in mind, parents will also be happy to know that our packaging is 100% recyclable! 3 AAA batteries are required and included. Recommended for toddlers 18 months and over.

❕【Note】Requires to load 3 x AG13 button batteries (Included in school bus). A set of spare batteries and a screwdriver are included in the package.
